messages.message:
Hey guys quick question here - now that we are applying branch protection rules to release-* branches, what is the mechanism to do cherrypicks for non admin users.

I have so far been cherrypicking by having a local branch (on my clone of the upstream instabase/instabase) that tracks the release-* branch. i cherrypick to this local branch and then push it to the remote branch. This does not work anymore.
i’ll lift the admin user restriction. it actually doesn’t make sense for our try release process because it means that only admins can be release coordinators.
changes to the current release should still go thru whoever the current coordinator is tho :)
Yes :slightly_smiling_face: an exception there is customer specific branches as well which are being managed by folks that are looking at specific customer specific delivery
